analysis.description:
CryptoHearthStone.withdrawAll (/unique_chucks/21/0xd7c397c79ad774e88470d73b4a04a8970dbae7dd.sol#108-110) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/21/0xd7c397c79ad774e88470d73b4a04a8970dbae7dd.sol#108-109)

CryptoHearthStone.withdrawAmount (/unique_chucks/21/0xd7c397c79ad774e88470d73b4a04a8970dbae7dd.sol#112-115) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(_amount) (/unique_chucks/21/0xd7c397c79ad774e88470d73b4a04a8970dbae7dd.sol#113-115)

CryptoHearthStone.purchase (/unique_chucks/21/0xd7c397c79ad774e88470d73b4a04a8970dbae7dd.sol#161-189) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- oldOwner.transfer(payment) (/unique_chucks/21/0xd7c397c79ad774e88470d73b4a04a8970dbae7dd.sol#185-186)
